details.title: Internetworking and Resource Management in Satellite Systems [Guest Editor's Introduction]
details.abstract: Discusses the three articles that are part of a series on internetworking and resource management in satellite systems. The first article appears in the July 2007 Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine issue "Network architecture and radio resource management for satellite digital multimedia broadcast system"); the second article appears in the August 2007 issue ("PEPsal: A performance enhancing proxy for TCP satellite connections"); and the third article in the series appears in the September 2007 issue ("Advanced channel coding for Hap-based broadcast services").
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
